attributes.action: stop teacher training days during term time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teachers have more paid holidays than any other profession and yet at the start of every term I have to arrange childcare for my children due to training days, these should be done during school holidays and not term time.  We are constantly being told how important a childs education is but they lose a days school every term.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
